title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Tag tag component, used to mark transaction attributes and dimensions

title: Color
content: You can use color to set the background color of a label.
findIntroStr: Tag tag component, used to mark transaction attributes and dimensions

title: Border
content: You can use hit to set the label border. The options are true and false. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: Tag tag component, used to mark transaction attributes and dimensions

title: Dimension
content: You can use size to set the tag size. The value can be medium, small, or mini.
findIntroStr: Tag tag component, used to mark transaction attributes and dimensions

title: Subject
content: You can use effect to set the tag theme. The value can be dark, light, or plain. typeYou can set the corresponding type for the tag. The options are success, info, warning, and danger.
findIntroStr: Tag tag component, used to mark transaction attributes and dimensions

title: Dynamic Edit Tag
content: Click + New Tag and enter the tag name in the text box to create the last tag in the tag list. The closable attribute can be set to removeable tags for tags.
findIntroStr: Tag tag component, used to mark transaction attributes and dimensions

title: Disabled
content: You can set disabled to disable the tag.
